forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 12C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High around 55F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 5C. SSE winds shifting to NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 41F. SSE winds shifting to NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 13C. NNE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High around 55F. NNE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
